# state

**Instance Property**

The state of an object-tracking provider.

## Declaration

```swift
final var state: DataProviderState { get }
```

## Inspecting an object-tracking provider

- **allAnchors**: An array of all the object anchors the object-tracking provider is tracking.
- **anchorUpdates**: An asynchronous sequence of anchors the framework updates.
- **ObjectTrackingProvider.Error**: Values that represent an object-tracking error.
- **description**: A textual representation of this object tracking provider.
